data.title: Marcel van Eeden
data.meta_description: Marcel van Eeden. Internationally renowned draftsman who charts the time before his birth in 1965. Galerie Maurits van de Laar has been representing him since 1993. The gallery now shows an overview of his work since 1993. The exhibition runs until 26 May 2019.
data.text:
1965 born in The Hague, The Netherlands
